person.persName: John B. Wadlington (Caldwell co., ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James Wadlington and Elizabeth Wadlington. Married to Ellen Susan Jennings Wadlington in Trigg County, Kentucky, on December 28, 1848. Served in 4th Regiment Kentucky Volunteers as a second lieutenant from October 1, 1847 to March 1848. Father of John B. Wadlington, Robartus Wadlington, and James Wadlington. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Caldwell County in 1860.
